http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif JISC-RSC-E-HE List JISC-RSC-E-HE List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=JISC-RSC-E-HE&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=JISC-RSC-E-HE.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-02-02T11:17:13Z Malcolm Bodley 2015-02-02T11:16:53+00:00 2015-02-02T11:16:53+00:00 E-learning and technical managers forums https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-RSC-E-HE;eb443402.1502 Apologies for cross posting<br>Hi All,<br><br>I suggest that we congregate on the 27th February at Shuttleworth College SG18 9DXwith coffee from 10:00<calendar:T1:10:00> onwards with a formal start at 10:30<calendar:T1:10:30>.<br><br>The theme is Responses to FELTAG - so we are looking for presentations and round the table discussion on how colleges have been approaching the implementation of FELTAG recommendations. Inclusion of eLearning content in Programs of Study will obviously be a hot topic - but input on other aspects of FELTAG will be welcome. [...] Bone, Catherine 2014-09-04T11:11:26+00:00 2014-09-04T11:11:26+00:00 What do students entering HE expect from digital technologies? https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-RSC-E-HE;f32a2acc.1409 Dear Colleague,<br>I hope you all had a great summer.<br>You may be interested in the following blog post regarding "What do students entering HE expect from digital technologies?"<http://www.jisc.ac.uk/blog/what-do-students-entering-he-expect-from-digital-technologies-01-sep-2014><br><br>Kind regards,<br>Catherine<br><br>Catherine Bone | Deputy Manager | Jisc RSC Eastern<br><br>Tel: 01245 684097| Mobile: 07919 392768| Skype: catherinebone<br><br>Email: c.bone@rsc-eastern.ac.uk<mailto:g.hayes@rsc-eastern.ac.uk> | Web: http://www.jiscrsc.ac.uk/eastern<br><br>Anglia Ruskin University, Bishop Hall Lane, Chelmsford, CM1 1SQ [...] Bone, Catherine 2014-06-19T09:08:43+00:00 2014-06-19T09:08:43+00:00 New colleges can apply to become directly HEFCE-funded in 2015-16 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-RSC-E-HE;4ceabe4e.1406 Dear Colleagues,<br>Apologies for cross posting, but this may be of interest to you.<br>Kind regards,<br>Catherine<br><br>New colleges can apply to become directly HEFCE-funded in 2015-16<br>A window for new publicly funded further education colleges and sixth-form colleges to become directly funded has opened. Colleges that apply will become funded from the 2015-16 academic year. [...] Bone, Catherine 2014-06-05T08:27:59+00:00 2014-06-05T08:27:59+00:00 Xerte Case Studies from Scottish HE Institutions - Xerte workshops at out e-Fair 4th July (bookings close tomorrow night) https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-RSC-E-HE;df436c21.1406 Dear colleagues,<br><br>You may be interested in the case studies below focusing on Xerte Online Toolkits, an award winning suite of browser-based tools that allow anyone with a web browser to create interactive learning materials quickly and easily. Content can be delivered to all devices using standards compliant HTML5 and a responsive template can deliver material to both small screens and large desktop computers. Xerte is a free resource and we will be running workshops on using Xerte at our e-Fair on the 4th of July at West Suffolk College. Bookings close this Friday, please see attached flyer for further [...]
